original_title: 009ノ1（ゼロゼロクノイチ） THE END OF THE BEGINNING
overview: In a universe where the Cold War never ended and growing conflicts result in the rapid advancement of technological warfare, the cyborg spy Mylene Hoffman of the 00 Organization battles the agents of the Eastern block in a game of high tech espionage.
tagline: She was forced to become the perfect killing machine with a heart of steel.
title: 009-1: The End of the Beginning
